name: Raspinasi
tagline: Linux  Ubuntu & Raspberry PI and More
body:
### Welcome to GitHub Raspinasi Pages.

### Linux  Ubuntu & Raspberry PI and More 
`German`
Diese Remote-Repository Seite dient Hauptsächlich dem Raspberry Pi 
Die Administraition meines kleinen Einplatinen pc (Raspberry Pi) 
der unter anderem als Webcam Nagios und NAS Server dient

### Was ist Raspinasi 
Dienst dazu seine festplatte in sein System einzubinden 
Dabei kann man Dienste wie Seefile oder Owncloud einbinden 

### Raspinasi
Sie Können auch die Dienste unter abrufen 
upstream	https://github.com/tuxplayer/raspinasi.git (fetch)
upstream	https://github.com/tuxplayer/raspinasi.git (push)

### Authors and Contributors
You can @mention a GitHub tuxplayer to generate a link to their profile. The resulting `<a>` element will link to the contributor’s GitHub Profile. For example: In 2007, Chris Wanstrath (@defunkt), PJ Hyett (@pjhyett), and Tom Preston-Werner (@mojombo) founded GitHub.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out our [documentation]
### Sie Können auch die Dienste unter abrufen 
upstream	https://github.com/tuxplayer/raspinasi.git (fetch)
upstream	https://github.com/tuxplayer/raspinasi.git (push) or [contact support]

`### Enlisch `
Linux Ubuntu & Raspberry PI and More
This remote repository
Main I deal with Raspberry Pi
The Administraition my little single board computer (Raspberry Pi)
which serves inter alia as a webcam Nagios and NAS Server

### What's Raspinasi

To incorporate services his hard disk in his system

Use may services such as seefile or ownCloud embed
You can also use services under recall
upstream	https://github.com/tuxplayer/raspinasi.git (fetch)
upstream	https://github.com/tuxplayer/raspinasi.git (push) and we’ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
